description:
Drago (original version: Nova Dragonoid (Pyrus Dragonoid), nicknamed Drago (ノヴァ・ドラゴノイド/ドラゴ, Nova Doragonoido/Dorago), real name Salamander (サラマンダー)) is Dan Kuso`s Guardian Bakugan. As a Pyrus Dragonoid, his true form is that of a large red dragon. He serves not only as a battle partner, but also as a protector and source of wisdom. He`s impatient and does not like to fight, but wants to help Dan protect his home, the dimension of Vestroia. Over the course of the first season, Dan and Drago gradually build up their friendship, and by the season`s end, the two had become close friends.
Source: bakugan.wikia.com
name: Nova Dragonoid
